messages.title: Strong and Stable Leadership in the National Interest
messages.content: We need a General Election now to secure the strong and stable leadership the country needs to see us through Brexit and beyond.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Strengthening our negotiating hand in Europe
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A General Election now will strengthen our negotiating hand in Europe. It is the only way to ensure we have strong leadership, certainty and stability.

issues.brexitEurope: A General Election now will strengthen our negotiating hand in Europe.

quotes.text: The choice at this election is between strong and stable leadership in the national interest with me – or weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.

examples: This decision cannot be delayed and needs to happen now.
We have a one-off chance to hold an election while the European Union agrees its negotiating position and before the detailed talks begin.
Strong and stable leadership in the national interest.
We need a General Election now to secure the strong and stable leadership the country needs to see us through Brexit and beyond.
The choice at this election is between strong and stable leadership in the national interest with me – or weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.
Strong and stable leadership in the national interest.
We need a General Election now to secure the strong and stable leadership the country needs to see us through Brexit and beyond.
A General Election now will strengthen our negotiating hand in Europe.

If we don’t have an election now, we will have uncertainty and instability because negotiations with the European Union will reach their most difficult stage in the run-up to the next General Election.
The choice at this election is between strong and stable leadership in the national interest with me – or weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.
The choice at this election is between strong and stable leadership in the national interest with me – or weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.
